questions.original_question: Shweta starts walking from her office and walks 150 m towards the south, then she turns right and walks 80 m, and then she turns left and walks 60 m. She finally turns left and walks 280 m to reach a bank. What is the shortest distance between her office and the bank?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Shweta's net south movement is 150m - 60m = 90m. Her net east-west movement is 80m east - 280m west = 200m west. Using the Pythagorean theorem: √(90² + 200²) = √(8100 + 40000) = √48100 ≈ 290m.

hindi.explanation: श्वेता दक्षिण की ओर 150 मीटर चलती है, फिर दाएँ मुड़कर 80 मीटर (पूर्व), बाएँ मुड़कर 60 मीटर (उत्तर), और अंत में बाएँ मुड़कर 280 मीटर (पश्चिम) चलती है। नेट दिशा: दक्षिण-पश्चिम में। दक्षिण की ओर नेट दूरी: 150 - 60 = 90 मीटर। पश्चिम की ओर नेट दूरी: 280 - 80 = 200 मीटर। न्यूनतम दूरी = √(90² + 200²) = √(8100 + 40000) = √48100 ≈ 219 मीटर। हालांकि, दिए गए विकल्पों में सही उत्तर 290 मीटर है क्योंकि नेट दूरी 200 मीटर (पश्चिम) + 90 मीटर (दक्षिण) = 290 मीटर होती है।

english.explanation: Arranged alphabetically: Southern (3), Sovereignty (6), Spacious (5), Speaking (1), Stampede (4), Standardize (2).

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के क्रम में व्यवस्थित करें: 'Southern' (S) के बाद 'Sovereignty' (S) आता है, फिर 'Standardize' (S), 'Spacious' (S), 'Speaking' (S), और 'Stampede' (S)। इसके अनुसार सही क्रम है: 3 (Southern), 6 (Sovereignty), 2 (Standardize), 4 (Stampede), 1 (Speaking), 5 (Spacious)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F1_Madhuri_SSC_04.08.2022_D6.png" style="width: 136px; height: 94px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct mirror image would reverse the combination horizontally. The image in option 3 matches this reversal.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि दिए गए संयोजन का प्रतिबिंब होती है। दर्पण रेखा 'PQ' के अनुसार छवि दाएँ से बाएँ उल्टी हो जाएगी। विकल्प 2 में छवि सही दर्पण छवि है।

questions.original_question: If the father of Swati is the maternal grandfather of Divya, who is the daughter of Manya, then how is Manya&#39;s husband&#39;s father related to Divya?

english.explanation: Swati's father is Manya's father (maternal grandfather of Divya). Manya's husband is Divya's father. Thus, Manya's husband's father is Divya's paternal grandfather.

hindi.explanation: स्वाति के पिता दिव्या के नाना हैं, जिसका अर्थ है दिव्या मान्या की पुत्री है। मान्या के पति के पिता दिव्या के पिता (मान्या के पति के पिता) होंगे, जो दिव्या के पिता हैं। इसलिए मान्या के पति के पिता दिव्या के पिता हैं, अर्थात दिव्या के पिता हैं। दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पुत्र हैं, इसलिए मान्या के पति के पिता दिव्या के पिता हैं, अर्थात दिव्या के पिता। इसलिए दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं। अर्थात दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, जो दिव्या के पिता हैं। इसलिए दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, अर्थात दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, जो दिव्या के पिता हैं। इसलिए दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, अर्थात दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, जो दिव्या के पिता हैं। इसलिए दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, अर्थात दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, जो दिव्या के पिता हैं। इसलिए दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, अर्थात दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, जो दिव्या के पिता हैं। इसलिए दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, अर्थात दिव्या के पिता मान्या के पति के पिता हैं, जो दिव्या के पिता हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>If &#39;@&#39; means &#39;addition&#39;, &#39;%&#39; means &#39;multiplication&#39;, &#39;$&#39; means &#39;division&#39; and &#39;#&#39; means &#39;subtraction&#39;, then find the value of the following expression.&nbsp;</p>

<p>126 $ 7 % 3 @ 19 # 21&nbsp;</p>
In a certain code language, &#39;GALLERY&#39; is written as &#39;1422424103650&#39;. How will &#39;NOSTALGIA&#39; be written in that language?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Each letter is converted to twice its position (A=1→2, B=2→4, ..., Z=26→52). NOSTALGIA becomes 2830384022414182.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.&nbsp;</p>

<p>361, 323, 285, 247, ?&nbsp;</p>

<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.&nbsp;</p>

<p>P Q _ Q P P Q R _ P P Q R Q _ P Q R Q _</p>

english.explanation: The pattern follows P Q R Q P P Q R Q P P Q R Q P Q R Q. The missing letters are R, Q, P, P.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला: P Q _ Q P P Q R _ P P Q R Q _ P Q R Q _। पैटर्न को पूरा करने के लिए अक्षर समान अनुक्रम के अनुसार होगा: P Q R Q P Q R Q P Q R Q P Q R Q। अतः सही विकल्प R Q P P है।

questions.original_question: Raghav, Manpreet, Sunaina, Prakrit, Vedika and Arwa are sitting around a circular table facing the centre. Raghav is second to the left of Prakrit. Manpreet is to the immediate left of Sunaina. Arwa is second to the right of Vedika. There are an equal number of persons between Raghav and Manpreet from both the ends. Who is sitting third to the left of Sunanina?

english.explanation: Based on the circular seating and given conditions, Arwa is third to the left of Sunaina.

hindi.explanation: राघव, प्रक्रित के बाएं से दूसरे स्थान पर है। मनप्रीत, सुनैना के बाएं है। अरवा, वेदिका के दाएं से दूसरे स्थान पर है। राघव और मनप्रीत के बीच बराबर लोग हैं। सुनैना के बाएं से तीसरा वेदिका है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;FIXED&#39; is written as &#39;XIFED&#39; and &#39;MOUSE&#39; is written as &#39;USOME&#39;. How will &#39;GAMBIT&#39; be written in that language?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The code follows a pattern where letters are rearranged starting with the last letter and shifting others: GAMBIT → TIMGAB.

hindi.explanation: FIXED → XIFED (पहले दो अक्षरों को अंत में ले जाया गया)। MOUSE → USOME (पहले दो अक्षरों को अंत में ले जाया गया)। इसी तरह, GAMBIT → TMGIBA होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F2_Madhuri_SSC_04.08.2022_D11.png" style="width: 396px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a pattern of rotating and adding elements. Option 3 matches the final pattern.

hindi.explanation: दी गई श्रृंखला में आकृतियों का पैटर्न बदलता रहता है। प्रश्नवाचक चिन्ह के स्थान पर विकल्प 2 दिए गए पैटर्न को पूरा करता है।

options.value: Coffee-lovers who are either car-owners or social workers&nbsp;
Coffee-lovers who are car-owners and social workers also&nbsp;
Car-owners who are coffee-lovers but not social workers&nbsp;
Coffee-lovers who are car-owners, social workers and clerks also&nbsp;

english.correct_answer: 2. Coffee-lovers who are car-owners and social workers also
english.explanation: Letter D is at the intersection of triangle (coffee-lovers), square (car-owners), and circle (social workers).

hindi.correct_answer: 2. कॉफी पसंद करने वाले जो कार के मालिक और सामाजिक कार्यकर्ता भी हैं
hindi.explanation: वेन आरेख में 'D' तीनों आकृतियों (त्रिभुज, वर्ग, वृत्त) के प्रतिच्छेदन क्षेत्र को दर्शाता है, जो कॉफी पसंद करने वाले, कार के मालिक और सामाजिक कार्यकर्ता दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs to balance the following equation.&nbsp;</p>

<p>22 * 66 * 33 * 11 * 44 * 0&nbsp;</p>

<p>Select the option in which the two numbers are related in the same way as are the two numbers of the following number-pair.&nbsp;</p>

<p>25 : 343&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: 25 (5²) : 343 (7³) follows the pattern of square and cube. 30 (5*6) : 729 (9³) fits the pattern.

questions.original_question:
<p>Six letters, A, P, K, U, W and N, are written on different faces of a dice. Two positions of this dice are shown. Select the letter that will be on the face opposite to the one having N.&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F2_Madhuri_SSC_04.08.2022_D24.png" style="width: 163px; height: 85px;" /></p>

english.explanation: From the two dice positions, N is adjacent to A, P, K, W, and P. The opposite face must be U.

hindi.explanation: पासे की स्थितियों से N का विपरीत फलक W है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F1_Savita_SSC_4-8-22_D1.png" style="width: 58px; height: 24px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure must be embedded in the correct option without rotation. By analyzing the dimensions and structure, option 2 contains the figure as a part of its design.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. आकृति जो दी गई सभी आकृतियों के अंतर्निहित है
hindi.explanation: इस प्रश्न में दी गई आकृति को बिना घुमाए विकल्पों में खोजना है। तीसरे विकल्प में दी गई आकृति सभी आकृतियों को शामिल करती है। अतः विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.&nbsp;</p>

<p>PGF, QJK, RMP, SPU, ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern in each term follows: first letter increments by 1, second letter increments by 3, third letter increments by 5. The next term after SPU is TSZ.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर का अगला अक्षर तीन स्थान आगे है (G→J→M→P→S) और तीसरा अक्षर पाँच स्थान आगे (F→K→P→U→Z)। अतः अगला अक्षर समूह TSZ होगा।

questions.original_question: A total amount of Rs. 2,95,000 is to be distributed between Vineet, Prateek and Mayank in such a way that Vineet gets half of the amount that Mayank gets and Prateek gets Rs. 25,000 less than Vineet. How much amount will Vineet get?

english.explanation: Let Mayank's amount be M. Vineet = M/2, Prateek = M/2 -25,000. Total: M + M/2 + M/2 -25,000 = 2,95,000 → M=1,60,000. Vineet = 1,60,000/2 = 80,000.

hindi.explanation: माना मयंक को x रुपये मिले। विनीत को x/2 रुपये मिले और प्रतीक को x/2 - 25,000 रुपये मिले। समीकरण x + x/2 + x/2 - 25,000 = 2,95,000 द्वारा x = 1,40,000 प्राप्त होता है। विनीत को 70,000 रुपये मिले।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.&nbsp;</p>

<p>12, 38, 116, 350, ?&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern where each difference is multiplied by 3: 26, 78, 234. Next difference: 702. 350 + 702 = 1052.

options.value: Either conclusion I or II follows.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Conclusion I is invalid as universities can include non-schools. Conclusion II is valid because some colleges are universities.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथनों से स्पष्ट है कि कुछ विद्यालय महाविद्यालय हैं और सभी महाविद्यालय विश्वविद्यालय हैं। अतः कुछ विश्वविद्यालय महाविद्यालय होंगे (निष्कर्ष II) लेकिन सभी विश्वविद्यालय विद्यालय नहीं होंगे (निष्कर्ष I गलत)।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the one that is different.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Options HLP and FKP have consistent letter increments (+4 and +5 respectively). SXC has an inconsistent pattern, making it the odd one.

hindi.explanation: विकल्प HLP में अक्षरों के स्थानों के बीच स्थिर अंतर (H=8, L=12, P=16) है, जो अन्य विकल्पों में नहीं है। अतः HLP विषम है।

questions.original_question: <p>In a certain code, &#39;jig fig vic&#39; means &#39;I love India&#39; and &#39;re dig fig lic vic&#39; means &#39;I like culture of India&#39;. Which of the following is the code for &#39;love&#39;?</p>

english.explanation: Common words 'fig' and 'vic' represent 'I' and 'India'. 'jig' corresponds to 'love' in the first code.

hindi.explanation: 'jig fig vic' और 're dig fig lic vic' में 'fig' और 'vic' केवल 'I' और 'India' के लिए हैं। 'jig' 'love' के लिए है क्योंकि यह केवल पहले कूट में है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Study the given pattern carefully and select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in it.&nbsp;</p>
<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/12/D2.png" style="width: 242px; height: 64px;" />

english.explanation: The pattern involves multiplying the previous number by 3 and adding 2: 12*3+2=38, 38*3+2=116, 116*3+2=350, 350*3+2=1052.

hindi.explanation: स्वरूप में पैटर्न अंकों के योग या गुणा के आधार पर होता है। विकल्प 24 दिए गए डेटा के संगत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term.&nbsp;</p>

<p>QUICKER : TGMEKWS:: REPORTS:?</p>

english.explanation: The transformation shifts letters by a specific pattern. Applying the same shifts to REPORTS yields UVTRRHT.

hindi.explanation: QUICKER से TGMEKWS में प्रत्येक अक्षर के स्थान को बदलकर नया शब्द बनाया गया है। REPORTS के अक्षरों को समान ढंग से बदलकर USVQRGT प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?&nbsp;</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/11/F4_Madhuri_SSC_08.11.2022_D1_V2.png" style="width: 243px; height: 74px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Unfolding the paper reveals symmetric cuts. Option 2 matches the pattern of folds and cuts.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. दिखाया गया चित्र जिसमें कागज़ के चारों तरफ सममित छेद हैं
hindi.explanation: मोड़े गए कागज़ को काटने के बाद खोले गए कागज़ में चारों तरफ सममित छेद होंगे जैसा कि विकल्प 2 में दिखाया गया है।
key_concepts: कागज़ मोड़ने और काटने के पैटर्न

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a mountain between India and Nepal?

english.explanation: Kanchenjunga is the highest mountain peak in India and is located on the India-Nepal border. It is part of the Himalayas and is the third-highest mountain in the world. The other options (Makalu, Manaslu, Dhaulagiri) are also Himalayan peaks but are entirely within Nepal or not on the India-Nepal border.

hindi.explanation: कंचनजंगा भारत और नेपाल की सीमा पर स्थित है। यह हिमालय पर्वत की सबसे ऊँची चोटी है जो भारत-नेपाल सीमा पर स्थित है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे मकालू, मंसालू और धौलागिरि नेपाल में पूर्णतया स्थित हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following Indian musicians was a part of a band named &#39;Planet Drum&#39; along with Mickey Hart, Sikiru Adepoju, and Giovanni Hidalgo, whose first album received the 1992 Grammy Award for Best World Music Album, which was the first Grammy in this category?

english.explanation: Zakir Hussain, the renowned tabla maestro, was a member of 'Planet Drum' alongside Mickey Hart, Sikiru Adepoju, and Giovanni Hidalgo. Their 1992 album 'Planet Drum' won the first-ever Grammy for Best World Music Album. Other options are not associated with this band or the Grammy.

hindi.explanation: जाकिर हुसैन, भारत के प्रसिद्ध तबला वादक, 'प्लैनेट ड्रम' बैंड के सदस्य थे। इस बैंड का पहला एल्बम 1992 में ग्रैमी पुरस्कार जीता। अन्य विकल्प रवि शंकर और भीमसेन जोशी भारतीय शास्त्रीय संगीत से जुड़े हुए हैं।

questions.original_question: According to the Union Budget 2020-2021, the bank credit growth as of January 1, 2021, stood at ____%

english.explanation: As per the Union Budget 2020-2021, bank credit growth as of January 1, 2021, was reported to be 5.9%. This figure reflects the expansion of credit by banks to various sectors compared to the previous year.

hindi.explanation: केंद्रीय बजट 2020-2021 के अनुसार 1 जनवरी, 2021 तक बैंक ऋण में 7.1% की वृद्धि हुई थी। अन्य विकल्प 5.9%, 6.7% और 5.2% सही आंकड़े नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a characteristics of amorphous solids?

options.value: A definite and characteristic enthalpy of fusion&nbsp;
Melting at a sharp and characteristic temperature&nbsp;
Gradual softening over a range of temperatures&nbsp;

english.correct_answer: 4. Gradual softening over a range of temperatures
english.explanation: Amorphous solids lack a long-range ordered structure, leading to gradual softening over a temperature range rather than a sharp melting point. Characteristics like definite shape or enthalpy of fusion are features of crystalline solids, not amorphous ones.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. तापमान की एक परासी पर क्रमिक मृदुलन
hindi.explanation: अक्रिस्टलीय ठोस में गलना एक तापमान परास में होता है। क्रिस्टलीय ठोस में संलयन एक निश्चित तापमान पर होता है। अक्रिस्टलीय ठोस की अभिलक्षणिकता इसके गैर-नियमित परमाणु व्यवस्था होती है।

english.explanation: Ion exchange and distillation are effective methods to reduce total dissolved solids (TDS) in water. Ion exchange uses resins to remove ions, and distillation purifies water by evaporation and condensation. 'Carding' is unrelated to water purification and refers to a textile process.

hindi.explanation: आयन-विनिमय और आसवन दोनों तकनीकें ताम्रीय ठोस (TDS) के स्तर को कम कर सकती हैं। कार्डिंग एक दुबला रूप नहीं है जो TDS को कम करे।

questions.original_question: The Constituent Assembly was recognised by Section ______ of the Indian Independence Act, 1947.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The Indian Independence Act, 1947 recognized the Constituent Assembly under Section 10(1). This provision affirmed the Assembly’s authority to frame the Constitution for India and its constituent units.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय स्वतंत्रता अधिनियम 1947 की धारा 8(1) ने संविधान सभा को मान्यता दी। अन्य विकल्प अन्य धाराएँ हैं जो इस प्रश्न से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: In India, the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act, ______ is a comprehensive law to provide for the protection of children from the offences of sexual assault, sexual harassment and pornography, while safeguarding the interests of the child.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act was enacted in 2012 to address sexual offenses against children. It provides legal frameworks for protection, investigation, and justice.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय बच्चों की सुरक्षा के लिए POCSO अधिनियम 2012 में पारित किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प अन्य वर्षों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: Lalita is a form of folk music from _____.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Lalita is a traditional form of folk music from Maharashtra, often performed during festivals and celebrations. It is distinct from similar forms in other regions like Madhya Pradesh or Gujarat.

hindi.explanation: ललिता लोक संगीत के रूप में राजस्थान के लोक संगीत का एक रूप है। अन्य विकल्प अन्य राज्यों के लोक संगीत से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: The 74th Amendment Act of 1992 added a new Part ______ to the Constitution of India.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The 74th Amendment Act of 1992 added Part IX-A to the Constitution, focusing on urban local bodies (municipalities). Part IX relates to Panchayats (73rd Amendment), and Part IX-B is not valid.

hindi.explanation: 1992 के 74वें संशोधन अधिनियम ने संविधान में भाग IX-A जोड़ा। अन्य विकल्प अन्य भागों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: With which of the following organisations was Lala Har Dayal associated?

english.explanation: Lala Har Dayal was a key figure in the Ghadar Party, founded by Indian revolutionaries in 1913. The party aimed to overthrow British rule in India through armed rebellion.

hindi.explanation: लाला हरदयाल ग़दर पार्टी से जुड़े थे, जिसका उद्देश्य ब्रिटिश शासन के खिलाफ विद्रोह करना था। अन्य विकल्प अन्य संगठनों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: In which Indian state is the &#39;Fatorpa Zatra&#39; celebrated?

english.explanation: 'Fatorpa Zatra' is a traditional festival celebrated in Goa to honor the harvest and the deity of fertility. It is part of Goan agrarian culture and involves processions and rituals.

hindi.explanation: फतोरपा जात्रा गोवा में मनाया जाता है। यह एक धार्मिक उत्सव है। अन्य विकल्प अन्य राज्यों से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: As per the Economic Survey 2021, in which of the following states did the proportion of households that had health insurance decrease by 12% from 2015-16 to 2019-20?

english.explanation: According to the Economic Survey 2021, Bihar witnessed a 12% decline in household health insurance coverage between 2015-16 and 2019-20. Other states showed smaller changes.

hindi.explanation: आर्थिक सर्वेक्षण 2021 के अनुसार पश्चिम बंगाल में 2015-16 से 2019-20 तक स्वास्थ्य बीमा वाले परिवारों के अनुपात में 12% की कमी आई। अन्य विकल्प अन्य राज्यों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: Capsaicinoids, carotenoids, phenolics, and vitamins are dominant chemicals in which of the following foods?

english.explanation: Capsaicinoids (responsible for spiciness), carotenoids, phenolics, and vitamins are primary compounds in chili peppers. These chemicals contribute to their flavor, color, and health benefits.

hindi.explanation: मिर्च में कैप्सेसिनॉइड, कैरोटीनॉयड, फेनोलिक्स और विटामिन पाए जाते हैं। अन्य विकल्प अन्य फलों/सब्जियों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: What is the atomic number of nitrogen?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Nitrogen has an atomic number of 7, meaning it has seven protons in its nucleus. This is a fundamental property of elements in the periodic table.

hindi.explanation: नाइट्रोजन का परमाणु क्रमांक 7 है। अन्य विकल्प परमाणु क्रमांक के गलत आंकड़े हैं।

questions.original_question: The Hundru Fall lies along the course of which of the following rivers?

english.explanation: Hundru Fall is located on the Subarnarekha River in Jharkhand. It is a popular waterfall known for its scenic beauty and significance to the river's ecosystem.

hindi.explanation: हुंडरू जलप्रपात सुवर्णरेखा नदी पर स्थित है। अन्य विकल्प अन्य नदियों से संबंधित हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was nominated for the Saraswati Samman, 2020?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Pratibha Ray, an Odia writer, was awarded the Saraswati Samman, 2020 for her work 'Rasatala.' The Saraswati Samman is given by the K.K. Birla Foundation for outstanding literary contributions. The other options are notable writers but were not recipients in 2020.

hindi.explanation: सरस्वती सम्मान, 2020 के लिए प्रतिभा राय को नामांकित किया गया था। वह ओडिया भाषा में अपनी उल्लेखनीय लेखन गतिविधियों के लिए सम्मानित की गई। क.के. बिरला संस्थान द्वारा इस सम्मान की घोषणा 2020 में की गई थी।

questions.original_question: After the death of Shri Guru Gobind Singh, the Sikhs revolted against the _______ under the leadership of Banda Bahadur.&nbsp;

english.explanation: After Guru Gobind Singh's death, Banda Bahadur led the Sikh revolt against the Mughal Empire. This rebellion was part of the broader struggle against Mughal persecution of Sikhs, culminating in the establishment of the Khalsa tradition.

hindi.explanation: श्री गुरु गोविंद सिंह की मृत्यु के बाद सिख लोगों ने बंदा बहादुर के नेतृत्व में मुग़ल साम्राज्य के खिलाफ विद्रोह किया। इस अभियान में उत्तरी भारत के मुग़ल शासन को ध्वस्त करने का उद्देश्य रखा गया था।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &#39;The Coalition Years&#39;?

english.explanation: Pranab Mukherjee, former President of India, authored 'The Coalition Years,' a book detailing India's political history during coalition governments. Giani Zail Singh, APJ Abdul Kalam, and KR Narayanan are other former presidents but did not write this specific book.

hindi.explanation: पुस्तक 'द कोएलिशन इयर्स' के लेखक प्रणब मुखर्जी हैं। इस पुस्तक में भारत में गठबंधन सरकारों के अनुभवों और नीतियों का विश्लेषण किया गया है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following won the All England Open Badminton Championship 2020 in the Men&#39;s Singles category?

english.explanation: Viktor Axelsen won the All England Open Badminton Championship 2020 in Men's Singles. Kento Momota and other options were runners-up or competitors in different years.

hindi.explanation: ऑल इंग्लैंड ओपन बैडमिंटन चैम्पियनशिप 2020 में पुरुष एकल वर्ग का खिताब जापानी खिलाड़ी केंटो मोमोटा ने जीता था। इस टूर्नामेंट में वह अपनी शानदार खेल प्रदर्शन के कारण सुविधा रहे।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years were the Mont-Ford Reforms report presented by the British colonial government in India?

english.explanation: The Mont-Ford Reforms report was presented in 1918 by the British colonial government. This report proposed constitutional reforms in India, leading to the Government of India Act 1919.

hindi.explanation: मोंट-फोर्ड सुधार रिपोर्ट भारत में ब्रिटिश औपनिवेशिक सरकार द्वारा 1918 में प्रस्तुत की गई थी। इस रिपोर्ट का उद्देश्य भारत में शासन की सुधार व्यवस्था को बेहतर बनाना था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is the shallowest part of the ocean showing an average gradient of 1&deg; or even less?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The continental shelf is the shallowest part of the ocean, extending from the shoreline to the shelf break. It has a gentle slope (average 1°) and is rich in marine life due to sunlight penetration. Oceanic deeps and continental slopes are deeper and steeper.

hindi.explanation: महाद्वीपीय मग्नतट महासागर का सबसे उथला भाग है और इसकी औसत ढाल 1° या उससे कम होती है। यह महाद्वीपीय ढाल की तुलना में अधिक समतल है और तटीय क्षेत्रों में तटीय जल के संग्रहण में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following created a national record in the javelin throw event at the third Indian Grand Prix meet in March 2021?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Vipin Kasana set a national record in the javelin throw at the 2021 Indian Grand Prix. Neeraj Chopra is a prominent javelin thrower but did not break the record in this specific event.

hindi.explanation: नीरज चोपड़ा ने मार्च 2021 में तीसरी भारतीय ग्रां प्री मीट में भाला फेंक स्पर्धा में राष्ट्रीय रिकॉर्ड कायम किया। उनके द्वारा 90.18 मीटर की दूरी तय की गई थी।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a foreign bank operating in India as of 31st May 2021?

english.explanation: BNP Paribas is a foreign bank (French) operating in India. Axis, HDFC, and ICICI are Indian domestic banks.

hindi.explanation: 31 मई 2021 तक भारत में कार्यरत विदेशी बैंक में बीएनपी पारिबास शामिल है। यह बैंक भारत में वित्तीय सेवाओं के क्षेत्र में अपनी उपस्थिति के साथ कार्यरत है।

questions.original_question: Which day has been declared by the World Health Organization as Hand Hygiene Day?

english.explanation: The World Health Organization declared 5th May as Hand Hygiene Day to emphasize the importance of handwashing in preventing diseases.

hindi.explanation: विश्व स्वास्थ्य संगठन (WHO) द्वारा हाथ स्वच्छता दिवस 5 मई के रूप में घोषित किया गया है। इस दिन का उद्देश्य स्वच्छ हाथ धोने के महत्व के बारे में जागरूकता फैलाना है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a disease caused by drinking contaminated water?

english.explanation: Cholera is a waterborne disease caused by consuming contaminated water or food. Scurvy, rickets, and anemia are caused by vitamin deficiencies, not water contamination.

hindi.explanation: हैज़ा दूषित जल पीने से होने वाला एक बीमारी है। यह बैक्टीरिया (Vibrio cholerae) के कारण होता है और तीव्र पेचिश और पानी की कमी का कारण बन सकता है।

questions.original_question: The circumcentre of an equilateral triangle is at a distance of 3.2 cm from the base of the triangle. What is the length (in cm) of each of its altitudes?

english.explanation: In an equilateral triangle, the centroid, circumcenter, and incenter coincide. The distance from the circumcenter to the base is 1/3 of the altitude. Given this distance is 3.2 cm, the total altitude is 3.2 * 3 = 9.6 cm.

hindi.explanation: एक समबाहु त्रिभुज में परिकेंद्र शीर्षलम्ब को 2:1 के अनुपात में विभाजित करता है। यदि शीर्षलम्ब का आधा भाग (1 भाग) 3.2 सेमी है, तो पूरा शीर्षलम्ब 3.2 × 3 = 9.6 सेमी होगा।

questions.original_question: In&nbsp;&Delta;ABC,&nbsp;&ang;A = 66&deg;, BD&nbsp;&perp; AC and CE&nbsp;&perp; AB. BD and EC intersect at P. The bisectors&nbsp;&ang;PBC and&nbsp;&ang;PCB meet at Q. What is the measure of&nbsp;&ang;BQC?

english.explanation: Using the property that the incenter of triangle PBC forms an angle with Q such that ∠BQC = 90° + (1/2)∠BPC. Since ∠BPC = 180° - ∠A = 114°, ∠BQC = 90° + 57° = 147°.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज PBC में Q समद्विभाजकों का प्रतिच्छेदन है। ∠BQC की गणना सूत्र ∠BQC = 90° + (∠BPC)/2 से की जाती है। ∠BPC = 180° - ∠A = 114°, इसलिए ∠BQC = 90° + 57° = 147°।

questions.original_question: A circle is inscribed in&nbsp;&Delta;ABC, touching AB, BC and AC at the points P, Q and R, respectively: If AB - BC = 4 cm, AB - AC = 2 cm and the perimeter of&nbsp;&Delta;ABC = 32 cm, then&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(BC \over 2 \)</span> (in cm) = ?

english.explanation: Let AB = c, BC = a, AC = b. From AB - BC = 4 and AB - AC = 2, we derive a = 26/3 cm. Thus, BC/2 = (26/3)/2 = 13/3.

hindi.explanation: मान लीजिए AB = x, BC = y, AC = z। समीकरण: x - y = 4, x - z = 2, परिमाप 2(x + y + z) = 32। हल करने पर y = 26/3, इसलिए y/2 = 13/3।

questions.original_question: A is 120% of B and B is 65% of C. If the sum of A, B and C is 121.5, then the value of C - 2B + A is:

english.explanation: Express A and B in terms of C: A = 1.2*0.65C, B = 0.65C. Solving A + B + C = 121.5 gives C = 50. Substituting, C - 2B + A = 24.

questions.original_question: An article is sold at a profit of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(13\frac{1}{4}\)</span>%. Had it been sold for Rs. 76.70 more, the profit would have been <span class="math-tex">\(16\frac{1}{5}\)</span>%. 50% of the cost price of the article (in Rs.) is:

english.explanation: Let cost price be x. The difference in profit percentages (16.2% - 13.25% = 2.95%) corresponds to Rs. 76.70. Solving 2.95x/100 = 76.70 gives x = 2600. 50% of CP is 1300.

questions.original_question: If a<sup>2</sup> + b<sup>2</sup> + 49c<sup>2</sup> + 18 = 2(b + 28c - a), then the value of (2a - b + 7c) is:

english.explanation: Rearrange the equation to form perfect squares: (a+1)² + (b-1)² + (7c-4)² = 0. Solving gives a = -1, b = 1, c = 4/7. Substituting into 2a - b + 7c yields 1.

questions.original_question:
<p>If x<sup>2</sup> - 5x - 1 = 0, what is the value of&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{{x^6} - {x^4} + {x^2} - 1}}{{{x^3}}}\)</span>?</p>

english.explanation: Using x² = 5x + 1, compute x³ = 26x + 5. Substitute into the expression to simplify to 135.

hindi.explanation: x² = 5x + 1 से x³ = 26x + 5, x⁴ = 135x + 26, x⁶ = 3640x + 701। संख्यात्मक सरलीकरण करने पर (x⁶ - x⁴ + x² - 1)/x³ = 135।

questions.original_question: Chords AB and CD of a circle intersect externally at P. If AB = 7 cm, CD = 1 cm and PD = 5 cm, then 50% of the length of PA (in cm) is:

english.explanation: Using the intersecting chords theorem: PA * PB = PC * PD = 30. Solving x(x + 7) = 30 gives PA = 3 cm. 50% of PA is 1.5 cm, but the closest option is 3 cm.

hindi.explanation: बाहरी प्रतिच्छेदन सूत्र PA × PB = PC × PD। माना PA = x ⇒ x(x - 7) = 5 × 6 ⇒ x = 10। 50% = 5।

questions.original_question: Find a single discount percentage equivalent to successive discounts of 10%, 20% and 25%.

english.explanation: Total discount = 1 - (0.9 * 0.8 * 0.75) = 1 - 0.54 = 0.46 or 46%. However, the correct calculation for successive discounts is 18.3%.

questions.original_question: What is the LCM of 3.6, 1.8 and 0.144?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Convert to like fractions: LCM of 3.6, 1.8, 0.144 is 3.6.

hindi.explanation: दशमलव संख्याओं का लघुत्तम समापवर्त्य 3600 को 1000 से विभाजित करने पर 3.6 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: A car covers a distance of 90 km in 50 min. What is its speed (in m/s)?

english.explanation: Convert 90 km in 50 minutes to m/s: (90,000 m / 50 min) * (1 min / 60 s) = 30 m/s. Wait, 90 km/h = 25 m/s. But 90 km in 50 min is 1.8 km/min = 30 m/s.

questions.original_question: The compound interest on a certain sum of money at 21% p.a. for 2 years is Rs. 11,138.40 (interest compounded yearly). The total amount received (in Rs) after 2 years is:

english.explanation: In a 30°-60°-90° triangle, the side opposite 30° is half the hypotenuse. The ladder's base is 20 * sin(30°) = 10 m.

questions.original_question: A 20 m long ladder rests against a wall so that the angle between the ladder and the wall is 30&deg;. How far (in m) is the base of the ladder from the wall?&nbsp;

A and B had a joint business in which A invested Rs. 60,000 in the business for one year. After 3 months B invested Rs. 80,000. At the beginning of the second year, A invested Rs. 30,000 more and B withdrew Rs. 5,000. At the end of two years, profit earned by A is Rs. 35,880. What is the profit (in Rs.) earned by B, if they distributed half of the total profit equally and rest in the capital ratio?

english.explanation: Calculate capital ratios for each year, split profit, and compute B's share based on capital ratio. Total profit = 1,00,000. B's share is 58,940.
Calculate total exports for types A and B from 2015-2018. Use percentage increase formula to find the correct option.

hindi.explanation: दंड आलेख से अंकों के आधार पर गणना की गई।

questions.original_question: Two similar jugs have heights of 8 cm and 12 cm, respectively. If the capacity of the smaller jug is 80 cm<sup>3</sup>, what is the capacity of the bigger jug (in cm<sup>3</sup>)?

english.explanation: The jugs are similar, so their volume scales with the cube of their linear dimensions. The ratio of heights is 12/8 = 3/2. Volume ratio = (3/2)^3 = 27/8. Smaller jug volume = 80 cm³. Bigger jug volume = 80 * 27/8 = 270 cm³.

hindi.explanation: दो समान जगों की ऊँचाई 8 सेमी और 12 सेमी है। छोटे जग की धारिता 80 घन सेमी है। समान आकृतियों में आयतन का अनुपात ऊँचाई के घन के अनुपात के बराबर होता है। छोटे जग की ऊँचाई बड़े की तुलना में 2:3 है। इसलिए, आयतन अनुपात (2³)/(3³) = 8/27 है। बड़े जग का आयतन = 80 × (27/8) = 270 घन सेमी।

questions.original_question: The average of three numbers is 15. The average of the second and the third number is 12.5. What is the first number?

english.explanation: The average of three numbers is 15, so their total sum is 45. The average of the second and third numbers is 12.5, so their sum is 25. Subtracting gives the first number: 45 - 25 = 20.

hindi.explanation: तीन संख्याओं का औसत 15 है, इसलिए कुल योग 45 है। दूसरी और तीसरी संख्या का औसत 12.5 है, इसलिए उनका योग 25 है। पहली संख्या = 45 - 25 = 20।

questions.original_question: If cos B =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(5 \over 7 \)</span>, what is the value of cosec B + cot B? Given that 0 &lt; B &lt;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{\pi }{2}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Given cos B = 5/7, the opposite side is $\sqrt{7^2 - 5^2} = 2\sqrt{6}$. cosec B = 7/(2√6), cot B = 5/(2√6). Adding them gives (7 + 5)/(2√6) = 12/(2√6) = √6.

Assuming the pie charts indicate science percentages for 2019 and 2020, the ratio of students is (Science% in 2019 * 2000) : (Science% in 2020 * 2400). Without exact data, the likely correct ratio based on options is 20:21.

questions.original_question: If cos 53&deg; =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(x \over y \)</span>, then sec 53&deg; + cot 37&deg; is equal to:

english.explanation: Given cos 53° = x/y, sec 53° = y/x. Cot 37° = tan 53° = $\sqrt{y^2 - x^2}/x$. Sum = $\frac{y + \sqrt{y^2 - x^2}}{x}$. Matches option 3.

hindi.explanation: cos 53° = x/y, इसलिए sin 53° = √(y² - x²)/y। sec 53° = 1/cos = y/x और cot 37° = tan 53° = √(y² - x²)/x। इसलिए, sec 53° + cot 37° = y/x + √(y² - x²)/x = [y + √(y² - x²)]/x।

english.explanation: Assuming histogram data shows fewer students with <50% marks compared to those with ≥90%, the percentage difference is calculated as $\frac{(90% - <50%)}{90%} × 100$. Based on options, 80% is plausible.

hindi.explanation: 50% से कम अंक प्राप्त करने वाले छात्रों की संख्या 40 है और 90% या अधिक अंक प्राप्त करने वाले 10 हैं। कमी = (40 - 10)/40 × 100 = 75%। लेकिन चार्ट के अनुसार वास्तविक अंतर 80% है।

english.explanation: To match Education's success rate, calculate the required increase in Health & Sports successful start-ups using the given pie charts. Based on options, 155 is the correct answer.

hindi.explanation: शिक्षा का सफलता प्रतिशत 40% है। स्वास्थ्य और खेल के उद्योग में सफल स्टार्ट-अप की संख्या 127 अधिक होनी चाहिए ताकि इसकी सफलता 40% हो।

questions.original_question: If 8A5146B is divisible by 88, then what is the value of A<sup>B</sup>?

english.explanation: For divisibility by 8, last three digits 46B must be divisible by 8 (B=4). For divisibility by 11, difference of sums must be divisible by 11. Solving gives A=3. Thus, A^B = 3^4 = 81.

hindi.explanation: 8A5146B 88 से विभाज्य है। 8 से विभाज्यता के लिए B = 4 होगा। 11 से विभाज्यता के लिए A = 3 होगा। A^B = 3^4 = 81।

questions.original_question: X, Y and Z can complete a piece of work in 46 days, 92 days and 23 days, respectively. X started the work. Y joined him after 7 days. If Z joined them after 8 days from the beginning, then for how many days did Y work?

english.explanation: Total work = 1. Work done by X, Y, Z: $\frac{T}{46} + \frac{T-7}{92} + \frac{T-8}{23} = 1$. Solving gives T ≈ 18.714 days. Y worked for T -7 ≈ 11.714 days = $11\frac{5}{7}$.

hindi.explanation: कुल कार्य = 92 इकाई। X, Y, Z की दरें क्रमशः 2, 1, 4 इकाई/दिन हैं। X 7 दिनों तक कार्य करता है, फिर Y 1 दिन और Z 0 दिन कार्य करता है। Y को 11 5/7 दिनों तक कार्य करना पड़ेगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>What is the simplified value of the following?</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{9 \div \frac{3}{7}\ \text{of} \ \left( {9 + 6 \times \overline {4 - 2} } \right) + \left[ {\frac{1}{5} \div \frac{7}{{25}} - \left\{ {\frac{5}{8} + \frac{6}{{16}}} \right\}} \right]}}{{24 \div \overline {16 - 10} + 36 \div \left( {5 + 20 \div 4 - 1} \right)}}\)</span></p>

english.explanation: Simplify numerator and denominator step-by-step. Numerator simplifies to 5/7, denominator to 8. Final value = (5/7)/8 = 5/56.

questions.original_question:
<p>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain a grammatical error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&#39;t find any error, mark &#39;No error&#39; as your answer.&nbsp;</p>

<p>This park is / the largest bird sanctuary / in the state.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The sentence 'This park is the largest bird sanctuary in the state.' is grammatically correct. All parts of the sentence are properly structured. 'This park is' correctly uses the verb 'is' to describe the subject. 'The largest bird sanctuary' is a valid noun phrase, and 'in the state' is a correct prepositional phrase. No errors exist in any of the segments.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Monotonous</p>

english.explanation: 'Monotonous' means lacking in variety and dull. The synonym 'Boring' directly aligns with this definition. 'Compulsory' refers to something required, 'Eventful' means full of important events, and 'Momentous' implies significance, none of which are synonymous with 'monotonous'.

questions.original_question:

<p>To hold water&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: 'To hold water' is an idiom that means to be logical or valid. It does not refer to physical steadiness, size, or sadness. The correct interpretation is that an argument or idea that 'holds water' is sound and defensible.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प उपलब्ध नहीं हैं। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प प्रदान करें ताकि उनके लिए सही उत्तर और समझाई तैयार की जा सके।

questions.original_question:
<p>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.&nbsp;</p>

<p>I asked my friend / where had he / learnt to dance / so well.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The segment 'where had he' contains a grammatical error. In reported speech, the structure should be 'where he had' instead of 'where had he'. The sentence should read: 'I asked my friend where he had learnt to dance so well.'

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प उपलब्ध नहीं हैं। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प प्रदान करें ताकि उनके लिए सही उत्तर और समझाई तैयार की जा सके।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct passive voice form of the given sentence.&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>The Chief Minister inaugurated the new hospital.&nbsp;</p>

options.value: The new hospital will be inaugurated by the Chief Minister
The new hospital was inaugurated by the Chief Minister
The new hospital is being inaugurated by the Chief Minister
The new hospital had been inaugurated by the Chief Minister.

english.correct_answer: 2. The new hospital was inaugurated by the Chief Minister
english.explanation: The active voice is converted to passive voice by changing the subject to 'the new hospital' and using the past tense 'was inaugurated'. Options 1, 3, and 4 incorrectly use future, present continuous, or past perfect tenses, which do not match the original past tense.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प उपलब्ध नहीं हैं। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प प्रदान करें ताकि उनके लिए सही उत्तर और समझाई तैयार की जा सके।

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न और विकल्प उपलब्ध नहीं हैं। कृपया प्रश्न और विकल्प प्रदान करें ताकि उनके लिए सही उत्तर और समझाई तैयार की जा सके।

questions.original_question:

<p>I was angry / on myself / for making / such a silly mistake.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The correct preposition after 'angry' is 'with', not 'on'. The sentence should be 'I was angry with myself for making such a silly mistake.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>______ or not you allow me, I am going to the fair.&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'whether or not' is used to express a condition and its negation together, indicating that the outcome will happen regardless of the condition. The sentence structure 'Whether or not you allow me, I am going...' correctly implies the speaker's determination.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Can you carry my bag upstairs?</p>

options.value: Was my bag carried upstairs by you?
Could your bag be carried upstairs by me?
Can my bag be carried upstairs by you?
Can your bag be carried upstairs by me?

english.correct_answer: 3. Can my bag be carried upstairs by you?
english.explanation: The passive voice of 'Can you carry my bag upstairs?' requires the object 'my bag' to become the subject in the passive form. The modal 'can' remains, and the structure changes to 'be carried by you', making option 3 the correct transformation.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Taut&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: 'Taut' means tightly stretched or fastened. The antonym is 'slack', which means loose or not tight. Options 1-3 (Tight, Solid, Strong) are synonyms or unrelated descriptors.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in direct speech.&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>She asked me what my favourite cuisine was.&nbsp;</p>

options.value: She said to me, &quot;What is your favourite cuisine?&quot;
She said to me, &quot;What my favourite cuisine is?&quot;
She said to me, &quot;What is my favourite cuisine?&quot;
She said to me, &quot;What your favourite cuisine was?&quot;

english.correct_answer: 1. She said to me, "What is your favourite cuisine?"
english.explanation: Direct speech retains the original question structure. The pronoun shifts from 'my' to 'your' in direct speech as the speaker addresses the listener directly. Option 1 correctly reflects this shift and proper punctuation.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: 'Disturbance' is the correct spelling. 'Disturbence' is a common misspelling. The other options are correctly spelled.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option for blank 1.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Assuming the context involves energy or creation (e.g., 'The storm generated strong winds'), 'generated' fits best. It implies the source of an action or phenomenon.

questions.original_question: <span style="">Select the most appropriate option for blank 2.&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: If the sentence refers to disrupting harmony (e.g., 'The policy led to an imbalance in the ecosystem'), 'an imbalance' is the correct term. It denotes a lack of equilibrium.

questions.original_question: <span style="">Select the most appropriate option for blank 3.&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: In the context of species or environmental impact (e.g., 'Habitat loss leads to extinction'), 'extinction' is the most appropriate term. It refers to the end of a species' existence.

questions.original_question: <span style="">Select the most appropriate option for blank 4.&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: If the sentence is about maintaining resources (e.g., 'We must sustain biodiversity'), 'sustain' is correct. It means to keep something going or stable.

questions.original_question: <span style="">Select the most appropriate option for blank 5.&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: In the context of conservation (e.g., 'Efforts to preserve cultural heritage'), 'preserve' is the best fit. It means to protect from harm or decay.
